short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the time taken to watch a range of videos in a youtube playlist along with different modes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculate the time taken to watch a range of videos in a youtube playlist along with different modes.

Usage:
- open the playlist page
- click on the Youtube Playlist Ranger extension
- select the starting video & ending video

Time on different speed modes will be displayed.
